TopicTitle: F9 autosave does not work anymore

Articles.Content:
Now when i autosave F5 i get asked for a filename. Which is fine except F9 now does nothing.

Thank you

Interesting. Alt+F5 should be performing that function. You might want to check that your keyboard doesn't have the Alt key stuck or broken in some way. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

(Alt+F9 should allow you to load a named quicksave, too.)

ok, i found it, i just changed keyboards and didnt notice the bottom left key was Fn on my old one and now its ctrl. The Fn key is above delete on the right.

 Mac user need to use Fn F9 to retrieve last autosave. For some reason alt F5 works to quicksave though.

Still not getting an option to load a named Quicksave though.
